post:
Why LayerOnline is your #1 Choice for Unmetered Bandwidth VPS hosting?

High Performance

Similar to our SSD web hosting, our VPS are made for speed. We use latest in technology plus advanced tuning by our in-house geeks. You will feel the difference when you host your VPS with us. As some of our customer say, once you go LayerOnline, you can't go back.

24/7/365 Live Chat Support

Not many VPS providers offer true 24/7/365 live chat support. Whenever you have a question or problem about your server, even at 3am in the morning, we are just a click away, fixing your problem right on the spot. Our average wait time is less than 30 seconds. You may also reach us by Facebook, Skype, Email and ticketing system, our friendly staff is ready to assist you 24/7/365.

Rated #1 in Customer Service by HostAdvice. At LayerOnline customer is the king. You always get the attention and highest quality products and services from us.

99.95%+ Uptime

Gone the days when your VPS are down constantly for no reason. We take your VPS uptime seriously and our uptime meets and exceeds 99.95% Uptime SLA.

Made for the Cloud

LayerOnline offers the latest in container technology and provides you with 200+ one click script installer including WordPress. Everything is professionally done with zero coding required.

Unlimited Bandwidth

Each of our VPS comes with unlimited bandwidth. So there will be no surprise billing. Bring in as much traffic you like during holiday shopping season and any high traffic events you host. VPN and Proxy are allowed.

DDOS Protection

At LayerOnline we take security seriously. That's why we offer free DDOS protection for each of our VPS to guard against DDOS attacks.


Each VPS come with:

  • SSD Storage
  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • DDOS Protection
  • IPv6 IP
  • 50+ Linux Distros
  • 200+ One-Click Script Installer
  • Elasticity
  • 99.95% Uptime SLA
  • 24/7/365 Live Chat Support
